meanings.definition: To surpass in planning or strategy.
meanings.sent1: She always outplans her opponents in chess.
meanings.sent2: He outplans everyone in the office when it comes to project management.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outplans the birds by hiding extra nuts in different places.
meanings.sent4: The detective outplans the criminals with his clever strategies.
meanings.sent5: The general outplans the enemy by anticipating their every move.

meanings.definition: To devise a plan that is superior to others.
meanings.sent1: The team outplans their competitors by coming up with innovative ideas.
meanings.sent2: She always outplans her friends when organizing events.
meanings.sent3: The students outplans the teacher by creating a surprise party for her.
meanings.sent4: The architect outplans other designers with his unique building concepts.
meanings.sent5: The chef outplans the competition by introducing a new menu every season.
